## Installation

You can install the development version of AsthmaWorkshop from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("PSI-schools/AsthmaWorkshop")
```

## Run App

If you wish to run the application on your own computer you can do so by running
the following code:

``` r
library(AsthmaWorkshop)
AsthmaWorkshop::run_app(s)
```
